1242121.content: How Syndrome's plan will start?
1242121.title: He likes fat super heroes

choices: Increase their appetite and lower their metabolism
Make them want to get fat
12421211.content:
A figure came crashing through the door with great speed and strength. Leaving a huge dent in the door as it slammed into it as thought the figure and door slam into the ground.

Not to long after Mr. Incredible and Frozone rushed over to the door frame. Frozen looked down seeing the destruction that Mr. Incredible had cause yet again with his super human strength. The figure turning out be some low life thug.

Mr. Incredible and Frozone were using their police radio again when they heard about some man had kidnapped a woman for ransom.

"I told you not to get carried away." Frozone said annoyed looking down at the thug.

Mr. Incredible just shrugged his shoulder "I can't help it sometimes, I can't stand bad guys that kidnap people."

"That doesn't mean you got to slam people into doors" Frozone snapped.

"He'll be fine don't worry about" Mr. Incredible said. They heard a small groan come from the thug. "See what did I say he's fine".

Frozon could only sigh. And they two of them headed into the room it was mostly empty except for a chair and what seemed to be a woman that was tied to a chair her back facing the two men.

"Seems kinda weird though, that only random thug would have a hideout this high tech." Frozone said.

"Probably another narcissistic rich guy again" Mr. Incredible said. The two superheros made their way to the tied up woman. "Don't worry mam we are here to save you" Mr. Incredible said as he turned the chair over.

As the chair slid so the woman's front body would face them the superheroes looked confuse to see that the woman was actually but a life like doll.

"What the..." Was the only thing Frozone could get out before some weird tube popped out of the doll's mouth. The two superheroes could only look confused at his strange event. Till some green smoke blew out of the tube and Mr. Incredible and Frozone gagged and coughed as they unwillingly breathed it in.

As the somke began to clear they soon began to hear maniacal laughter. The two superheroesnlloked over and their wide grew wide as they saw someone who they thought was dead. Syndrome.

Though he wasn't their in person would his face was on a giant monitor that the two superheros could only guess it was camouflaged as a wall. "Syndrome" the superheroes said.

"Man to be honest I didn't actually think it would work, but you fell for it!" Syndrome said mockingly.

"What did you do to us!" Mr. Incredible said getting agitated.

"Sorry big guy but I don't ruin the surprise. Let's just say I've always admired big superheroes." Syndrome said then letting out another manical laugh before the screen turned off.

Though now instead of being angry they were now yet again confused.

"So what did that creep do to us?" Frozone asked.

"I'm not sure there doesn't seem to be anything wrong with us." Mr. Incredible said as he began to inspect his body.

"Maybe it failed" Frozone said.

"Possibly" Mr Incredible said scratching his head. "Let's just get out of here for now and let me now if anything goes wrong"

"Sure,"

The two superheroes began to leave the building and head home.

Though what they didn't know was that Syndrome wanted to make both Mr. Incredible and Frozone fat and that smoke that came out of that doll was going to help. The smoke that they breathed in would...
12421211.title: Syndrome's Dirty Tactics

Bruce woke and looked around to see that he was in a holding cell "How did I get here "said Bruce to himself he then tried to change into the Hulk just for nothing to happen "hmm this cell must be affecting my power "said Bruce just as he finished his sentence a slid in the cell door open and a
Tray full of food doughnuts pie burgers "Hey who are you let me out of here "shouted Bruce but he ignored he then looked at the food and made his mouth water "one couldn't hunt "thought Bruce as he picked up a burger and moaned at how good it tasted as he quickly finished off the first one and started to eat another unware he was being watched by a hungry Thanos
1243113111.title: Thanos wants eat him!

12431131113.content:
With the intention of seeing Bruce gain weight personally Thanos decides to visit his guest ...
Upon arriving at the cell where Bruce was, Thanos starts talking to his guest.
"Bruce Banner ... Am I right?" asked Thanos.
"Who are you?" Bruce replied with a question.
"I am Thanos, I see that you are enjoying the food ..." said Thanos sitting next to Bruce.
"Yes ... it is delicious!" said Bruce eating happily.
"You know, Bruce, many people are hungry and don't have much to eat ... But you, my boy, have an opportunity that unfortunately not everyone gets ... An opportunity to eat well like a king every day!" said Thanos poking Bruce's belly, noticing that he was starting to go limp ... Thanos was licking his lips at that moment.
"Seriously ... It's sad to think that way ..." said Bruce with hunger spread throughout the universe.
"Don't worry about it ... Here, have another burger!" said Thanos stuffing a burger in Bruce's mouth with this one without having any reaction.
"Don't forget to eat everything ..." said Thanos patting Bruce on the stomach.
12431131113.title: Writer choice

"Well we can't have at now can we "said Thanos setting the tray down infront of Bruce "Now make sure to eat every single bite "said Thanos patting Bruce with hungry smile

124311323112.content:
To trick Steve Rogers Thanos uses the stone of reality in an attempt to impersonate Peggy Carter ...
Thanos arrives on Earth ...
"Steve! Steve!" shouted Thanos in the form of Peggy.
"Peggy! Is it you? Is it really you?" asked Steve.
"Yes Steve, it's me! But let's go fast! You need to help me!" said "Peggy" again ...
Arriving at Thanos' ship transformed into a kind of labyrinth Steve notices that it has a wall made of pizza preventing the passage ...
"Er ... What does that mean?" asked Steve confused.
"Steve ... You need to eat ..." said "Peggy".
"Eat? But why?" asked Steve.
"Steve ... There are some hostages held by Thanos at the end of the labyrinth ... And you need to eat until you get to them ..." said "Peggy".
"Well ... A hero needs to make sacrifices to save the innocent ... Come on!" said Steve who started eating the pizzas to the delight of Thanos who smiled with his form of Peggy.
124311323112.title: Tricking Steve

"Well done Steve "said Peggy patting Steve belly trying not to drool "now ilford the next wall "said Peggy pointing to the next wall at was completely made out of cake
making Steve sigh

"I have a feeling by the time I save the hostages I might be fat "said Steve joking not knowing it was becoming true and started to eat the next wall

"Your right "said Steve as he kept eating
